rooms.description: Large entrance area with reception, adhering to Vastu principles for inviting energy.
Open space adjoining the courtyard; incorporates Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and bold colors.
Well-lit dining area with views to the courtyard; designed to be a social hub for joint family gatherings.
Modern kitchen with sufficient ventilation and natural light. Designed keeping the Art Deco style in mind.
vastu_considerations: South west to north east axis

rooms.description: Private guest room with access to the courtyard for natural light and fresh air.
Adjacent to guest bedroom, ensuring convenience and privacy.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Stately entrance door with Art Deco design elements.

courtyard.description: Central open courtyard ensuring ample light and air circulation throughout the villa.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, designed in an Art Deco style with geometric patterns and luxurious finishes.
Luxurious bathroom ensuring privacy and comfort, with integrated storage and natural light.
Slightly smaller bedroom for other family members, maintaining balance and privacy with adequate natural ventilation.
Additional bedroom for joint family needs, designed with Art Deco elements and comfortable space planning.
Multi-purpose study room/Home office integrated into the villa, offering quiet space with natural light.
Essential bathroom facilities ensuring ease of access.
Additional bathroom for family convenience and privacy.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize natural light and air flow.
Private balcony offering an exterior view and additional ventilation.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom for joint family, ensuring privacy with a focus on natural light.
Convenient bathroom placement for family members.
Dedicated storage space and utility area designed to be functional and accessible.
